DOC.brief_summary: Recent reports have suggested that transvaginal NOTES nephrectomy is feasible, yet comparative studies are lacking. The aim of this study was to compare the surgical outcomes of transvaginal NOTES nephrectomy to conventional laparoscopic nephrectomy.
DOC.brief_title: Transvaginal NOTES Nephrectomy Versus Conventional Laparoscopic Nephrectomy
